case.title: I need your love - 27 (London)
case.text:
Hi guys ,
Am a black single lady in my late 20s looking for a good man to have a serious relationship with . Am a very nice lady humble caring and maybe I should say pretty . I seem to find it hard to meet a decent nice man who would love me for who I am . if you get the chance to know me more you would be amazed at how lovely and nice I am . I have a good job hard working and smart . Am not the skinny kind of girl so if you are after skinny girls then am certainly not for you . However , am not overweight ! I take care of my appearance and health . If you are a white /black/ mixed race guy over 30 looking for a decent long term relationship with a lovely black lady then please get in touch and lets see what happens . I would also like to settle down with the right man have kids start a family etc . Email me a pic of yourself and tell me a bit more about you . If things go well we might even go on a date this weekend and see what happens afterwards . Only serious people should reply please . Hope to hear from all the lovely decent guys out there .
